thoughts.text: Now that I have the text version of the whitepaper, I can begin analyzing it to identify the cryptocurrency's goals, objectives, and target audience.
thoughts.reasoning: The text version of the whitepaper is easier to read and analyze than the PDF version.
thoughts.plan:
- Open the text version of the whitepaper
- Read the whitepaper
- Take notes on the goals, objectives, and target audience
- Save the notes to a file
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I read the whitepaper thoroughly and take comprehensive notes.
thoughts.speak: I will now open the text version of the whitepaper and read it to identify the cryptocurrency's goals, objectives, and target audience.
